title: Electric two-wheeler market sees huge 24% growth in February. Ola at top of sales chart
description: The electric two-wheeler market in India experienced a surge in registrations in February 2024, indicating the growing traction of electric vehicles. Ola Electric led the pack with the highest registrations and market share, followed by TVS Motor, Bajaj Auto, and Ather Energy.
